root.name: Brides of Dracula
root.description: Brides of Dracula is a one to two player game in which a player can control Dracula or Van Helsing. When playing the game appears in a spilt screen view very reminiscent of the earlier game Spy Vs Spy.When playing a Dracula the player must find 13 brides by finding them, biting them and leading by to the crypt to the awaiting coffin. As Van Helsing the player much find 13 tools capable of killing Dracula and take them back to the cupboard in Van Helsing's house.
